reviews.review_msg: Overall Dr. Barraza was a great prof. Extremely knowledgeable about course themes/materials, likes discussion, really wants to help students. However, a bit inflexible. I requested an extension for something (medical) after giving prior notice + multiple doctor's notes & while all other profs accommodate, she said she "never" does "no matter what".

I highly recommend taking a course with Maria! Her lectures are fascinating and inspiring and enhance the readings which are extremely thought provoking themselves. She is an incredible professor whose passion pulls you into the lectures and readings with ease. The best prof I've had thus far hands down.
